definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: Its pale rays fled out on either hand; beautiful but grim was the vision they disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 微弱的光線向兩旁流瀉而出，照出的景象美麗而陰森。

sentences.english: Melodious music escapes out the door.
sentences.chinese: 優美的音樂從門縫中流瀉出來。

sentences.english: Day Of Sunshine In The Skies.
sentences.chinese: 一個陽光流瀉於曔天的日子。

sentences.english: The brightness, such as pure , flows of stars.
sentences.chinese: 明亮如清輝流瀉的星辰。

sentences.english: The water of waterfall was overshooting our boat.
sentences.chinese: 瀑布奔騰的水流瀉落在我們的船上。
